snippet: A lawsuit filed against a village and the estate of a police officer who killed himself claims that investigators targeted a man as a homicide suspect because of he is black.
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit filed against a village and the estate of a police officer who killed himself claims that investigators targeted a man as a homicide suspect because of he is black.

headline.main: Illinois: Suit Says Police Investigators Targeted Man Because of His Race
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Suit Says Police Investigators Targeted Man Because of His Race
